metadata.description: Threat Hunting RAG System - Example Query Results

queries.query: Show me emails with urgent payment requests from new senders
queries.description: Finds emails with urgent language + unknown domains
queries.expected_behavior: Identifies phishing attempts using urgency + unfamiliar senders

results.subject: IMMEDIATE: Payment Overdue - Legal Action Pending
results.explanation_text:
Overview:
- Threat Level: LOW (0.318)
- Similarity=0.0 | Confidence: 0.43 | Rank: 1

Key Indicators:
- urgent_language 0.8 – Urgent wording requesting immediate action
- link_suspicious 0.6 – Link appears obfuscated or mismatched

Risk Summary:
- Financial request coupled with urgency signals potential payment fraud

Recommended Action:
- Low immediate risk; continue monitoring for patterns.

results.subject: URGENT: Account Will Be Closed Without Payment
results.explanation_text:
Overview:
- Threat Level: MEDIUM (0.437)
- Similarity=0.0 | Confidence: 0.54 | Rank: 4

Key Indicators:
- urgent_language 0.9 – Urgent wording requesting immediate action
- new_sender 0.7 – Sender not previously recognized
- link_suspicious 0.6 – Link appears obfuscated or mismatched

Risk Summary:
- Financial request coupled with urgency signals potential payment fraud

Recommended Action:
- Verify sender authenticity and scrutinize any financial or credential requests.

results.subject: Re: Urgent Wire Transfer Request
results.explanation_text:
